title: Meridians: A journal from everywhere
description: " A journal from everywhere" features poems, flash fiction, and digital artworks by contributing members of Pluma Migrant Writers Guild, a Kuwait-based writers' collective founded on September 14, 2013. The book tackles various migration themes and issues from diverse settings and timelines. Available in perfect bound paperback, the book can be purchased from different online retailers. For more details, visit www.plumawriters.org.
author: Pluma Migrant Writers Guild
